mapper.select: select c.*,s.cert_no,s.cert_date,s.valid_date,b.runScope as comRange,b.registerStatus as subsist from tb_company c left join tb_safety_certificate s on c.com_name = s.com_name left join mishu_next.cert_basic b on b.registerNo = c.org_code and b.companyName = c.com_name where 1=1 and c.com_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')

select c.*,s.cert_no,s.cert_date,s.valid_date,b.runScope as comRange,b.registerStatus as subsist from tb_company c left join tb_safety_certificate s on c.com_name = s.com_name left join mishu_next.cert_basic b on b.registerNo = c.org_code and b.companyName = c.com_name where 1=1 and c.com_id = #{comId} limit 1

select c.* from tb_company c where 1=1
and c.com_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')
and c.regis_address like CONCAT('%',#{province},'%')
and
c.regis_address like CONCAT(#{list},'%')
and c.regis_capital >= #{minCapital}
and c.regis_capital <= #{maxCapital}
and c.range like CONCAT('%',#{qualCode},'%')
and
c.range like CONCAT('%',#{zzList},'%')
order by c.px desc
select code from area where `name`=#{name} or display_name=#{name}
select id,display_name from area where grade=0 order by name_abbr
select display_name from area where parent_id=#{parentId} order by name_abbr
select * from tb_company where com_id=#{comId} limit 1
select uuid from cert_src where uuid is not null and companyCode=#{companyCode}

select id,nature,publishDate,projectName,actionCode,validityDate,publishSite,badBehaviorContent,score from cert_undesirable where validityDate > date(now()) and persionName is null and srcUUid in
#{item}

select sum(score) from cert_undesirable where validityDate > date(now()) and persionName is null and srcUUid in
#{item}
select logo from mishu.tb_company where com_id=#{com_id}
select count(*) from mishu_write.colle_company_new where companyId=#{comId} and userId=#{userId}

SELECT c.*, s.cert_no, s.cert_date, s.valid_date, b.runScope AS comRange, b.registerStatus AS subsist FROM tb_company c LEFT JOIN tb_safety_certificate s ON c.com_name = s.com_name LEFT JOIN mishu_next.cert_basic b ON b.registerNo = c.org_code AND b.companyName = c.com_name WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.`com_name` = #{comName} ORDER BY c.`created` DESC LIMIT 1
select url from tb_company_qualification where com_id = #{comId} limit 1
SELECT t.`display_name` AS displayName,t.`parent_id` as parentId FROM area t WHERE t.`grade` = 2 ORDER BY t.name_abbr
select display_name as displayName, SUBSTRING_INDEX(`path`, ',', -1) as path from area where parent_id=#{parentId} order by name_abbr
select t.* from tb_company t where 1=1 and t.regis_address like CONCAT(#{regisAddress},'%') order by t.px desc limit #{limit}
